home.name: En Gramma
home.text:
EN GRAMMA is a new Trance-Rock outfit from Rennes (France).

The trio performs a powerful blend of 'Afro-Dionysiac' Blues, Acoustic-Rock and minimalist Afrobeat; whilst singing in three languages (French, English and Ancient Greek). EN GRAMMA means "the trace that memory left".

Beau Brûlis is their debut album. It is a beautiful collection of stories, rooted in mystery and told through warm vocal melodies and catchy tribal rhythms. This is a truly unique and musically eclectic outfit, occupying the space between primitive and modern - acoustic and electric.

EN GRAMMA is formed around lead vocalist Gautier Degandt who toured across Europe with his hard-folk duo BÂTON BLEU (Dixiefrog records/ PIAS), Afro / Rock guitarist Oscar Philéas (MAMADOU KOITA), and talented percussionist Pierre-Yves Dubois.
